title: FS: Cool Trade Cards - H804-10 and H804-17 - BOTH SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Cool Trade Cards - H804-10 and H804-17 - BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARDS ARE SOLD

Have a couple of really cool variations available.

First is an H804-17 “Great Expectations” with a total color shift pass. Can’t recall seeing one like this. 

Second is an H804-10 “A Fly” which appears to be an advertisement for a game between Ex-Bay Cities vs First Ward Club in 1883….an actual baseball game it appears. Card is rougher condition but the advertisement is really cool. 

Asking $55 each including shipping.  I’m available via PM to discuss.

Thanks!
Jeff
